bug.description:
Describe the bug I install Jina on MacOS: <denchmark-code>pip install jina </denchmark-code>
Then I run: <denchmark-code>jina hello-world </denchmark-code>
get the following error: urllib.error.URLError: <urlopen error [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certi Describe how you solve it When trying to connect to https:// site in jina/jina/helloworld/helper.py, it will verify the cert, so I add the following code to get around my problem: import ssl
ssl._create_default_https_context = ssl._create_unverified_context and it works. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment
Python --version:3.7.6 MacOS: macOS Catalina 10.15.7
(btw, I'm not sure if I fix my problem in a right way or it just occurs on my environment, if you have a better way to solve it ,plz tell me, tks!

comments.comment: I run the same code on my Mac Pro(macOS Catalina 10.15.6),it works successfully - -,maybe there's sth different between macOS version.
